title: Overwrite AppV1 with V10000 “NEXUS OMNIVERSE” and ensure it compiles/runs (local-only, persisted brain)

requirements.text: Completely delete the current contents of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` and replace the entire file with the exact V10000 “NEXUS OMNIVERSE” code provided by the user (full overwrite), preserving all components, local mock data/constants, imports, Tailwind classes, UI strings, and interaction logic as given.

quotes:
INSTRUCTION : Efface tout le contenu actuel de `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` et remplace-le par le code ci-dessous.

VOICI LE CODE V10000 COMPLET À ÉCRIRE :

import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react';
...

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` matches the user-provided V10000 code block as the complete application UI/logic (Landing → Client Explorer → Pro Studio/Cockpit).
The local persistence key used by the app brain is exactly `nexus_omniverse_v10000` (read on init, write on any state change).
No backend calls are introduced; the app remains local-only state as defined in the V10000 code.

requirements.text: Ensure the V10000 `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` implementation compiles and runs in this repository by applying only minimal mechanical fixes required by repo wiring/dependencies (e.g., missing/incorrect imports, undefined identifiers referenced in JSX, invalid JSX, missing action functions referenced by components, or duplicate default exports), without changing the intended V10000 UI layout, styling, copy, datasets, or interaction behavior.

quotes: Assurer que ça compile et s’exécute (minimal mechanical fixes only).

acceptanceCriteria: `npm run build` and `npm run dev` succeed without runtime crashes on initial load.
Any compile/runtime fixes are strictly mechanical (import/identifier/JSX wiring) and do not alter visible design, text, or flow behavior described by the V10000 code.
All referenced icons/components/hooks used in JSX are defined/imported (e.g., lucide-react icons, Framer Motion exports, React hooks like `useRef`).

requirements.text: Preserve the repository entry wiring: do not modify `frontend/src/App.tsx` (must remain a thin wrapper rendering `AppV1`) and do not modify any frontend immutable entry files; the application must continue to mount through `frontend/src/main.tsx` as currently wired.

quotes: Efface tout le contenu actuel de `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` et remplace-le par le code ci-dessous.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` remains functionally unchanged (still renders `AppV1` as the root).
No edits are made to immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
The app still boots through the existing Vite/React entry and renders the new V10000 AppV1 UI.

constraints: Do not modify `frontend/src/App.tsx`; it must remain the thin wrapper that renders `AppV1`.
Do not modify any frontend immutable entry files/paths specified by SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose instead of editing those files).
Apply only minimal mechanical changes needed to make the pasted V10000 code compile/run; do not refactor, redesign, or rewrite features beyond build-fixing adjustments.
Keep the app local-only as per the provided V10000 code (no new backend integration).
Use English for any user-facing text in this build request (implementation UI strings must remain as provided by the user).
nonGoals: Implementing or restoring older backend-driven features (Motoko persistence, Internet Identity, React Query data fetching, on-chain image upload) beyond what exists in the provided V10000 code.
Adding new product features not explicitly present in the provided V10000 code block.
Changing the visual design system, copy, or interaction model of the provided V10000 UI (except for unavoidable build-fix adjustments).
